Description.Text:
The Surtees Hotel is a newly refurbished hotel on the picturesque Dean street which is a 2 minute walk from the world famous Charles Grey monument. The hotel is situated near Newcastles quayside which is home to an abundance of culture and attractions such as the Baltic and the Sage. The Surtees offers you comfort and style for as little as 49 with all rooms fitted with 28inch plasma screens, beautiful wood, ceramic and stainless steel fixtures and fittings.

the hotel pride itselves on being the most reasonably priced central hotel in Newcastle that provides a comfortable, friendly stay with beautiful rooms that deliver every need of the modern lifestyle.

Facilities:
There are a choice of room types available at the hotel from standard to deluxe rooms
An intimate bar located near reception
Meeting and conference rooms
28inch plasma TV
Free WIFI

Newcastles main shops, restaurants and clubs can be reached within 10 minutes walk. Guests can take a bus across the river to the famous Metrocentre shopping complex, and Greys Monument is a 2-minute walk away. Located in the heart of Newcastle city centre, Surtees Hotel is 5 minutes' walk from the city's main train station. Newcastle's nearby quayside is home to a variety of attractions.

Standard Triple Room - Standard Triple Room offers three single beds or one single and one double bed. All rooms are fitted to a high standard and feature en-suite bathroom, 28inch plasma television, FREE Wifi and tea and coffee making facilities. Hair-dryers and ironing boards are available from reception.
Superior Single - Superior Single Room offers one single bed. All rooms are fitted to a high standard and feature en-suite bathroom, 28inch plasma television, FREE Wifi and tea and coffee making facilities. Hair-dryers and ironing boards are available from reception.
Superior Double - Superior Double Room offers one double bed. All rooms are fitted to a high standard and feature en-suite bathroom, 28inch plasma television, FREE Wifi and tea and coffee making facilities. Hair-dryers and ironing boards are available from reception.
Superior Twin - Superior Twin Room offers two single beds. All rooms are fitted to a high standard and feature en-suite bathroom, 28inch plasma television, FREE Wifi and tea and coffee making facilities. Hair-dryers and ironing boards are available from reception.
Standard Single Room - Standard Single Room offers one single bed. All rooms are fitted to a high standard and feature en-suite bathroom, 28inch plasma television, FREE Wifi and tea and coffee making facilities. Hair-dryers and ironing boards are available from reception.
Standard Double Room - Standard Double Room offers one double bed. All rooms are fitted to a high standard and feature en-suite bathroom, 28inch plasma television, FREE Wifi and tea and coffee making facilities. Hair-dryers and ironing boards are available from reception.
Standard Twin Room - Standard Twin Room offers two single beds. All rooms are fitted to a high standard and feature en-suite bathroom, 28inch plasma television, FREE Wifi and tea and coffee making facilities. Hair-dryers and ironing boards are available from reception.
